overview:
Current DBGi Head of Marketing.

Gavriel Shaw brings senior management experience from London UK across various sectors including finance, communications, health, marketing services, construction, and more.

Gavriel has been involved with online marketing for over 10 years since the early days of SEO, website lead generation, and email marketing.

Dedicated to direct response marketing optimization, Gavriel has applied multivariate split testing to campaigns demonstrating as much as 510% campaign performance increase through the diligent use of data insight.

Currently completing a professional postgraduate diploma in marketing from the Chartered Institute of Marketing, Gavrielâ€™s first love in marketing is direct response copywriting.
